parameter.name: datacontrolsvisibility
parameter.help: If a datapath tag is declared, this attribute will be passed to the datapath when it's created. Default is false.

parameter.name: inset_bottom
parameter.help: Bottom inset for basetabpane in tabs content. Default is basetabs's inset_bottom.

parameter.name: inset_left
parameter.help: Left inset for basetabpane in tabs content. Default is basetabs's inset_left.

parameter.name: inset_right
parameter.help: Right inset for basetabpane in tabs content. Default is basetabs's inset_right.

parameter.name: inset_top
parameter.help: Top inset for basetabpane in tabs content. Default is basetabs's inset_top.

parameter.name: selected
parameter.help: If a basetabpane is selected, then it will be shown. Its associated tab will be also be selected.

parameter.name: tab
parameter.help: The tab associated with this basetabpane.

parameter.name: tabclass
parameter.help: The tabclass to use to instantiate its associated tab. This overrides the basetabs tabclass.
